title: Why X is the foundation of all web3 marketing
description:

title: Gold Nears Record High Amid Global Uncertainty, Surges to $2,071 an Ounce
description: The price of an ounce of pure gold has approached its highest historical level this weekend, reaching $2,071 per ounce. This peak nearly matches its record three years ago on August 7, 2020, when during the Covid-19 pandemic, spot gold prices soared to an unprecedented high of $2,072.50 per ounce. Gold Flirts With Lifetime Price […]

title: OpenAI Introduces GPTs: Tailoring ChatGPT for Personal and Professional Use
description: In a significant move, OpenAI has recently introduced a range of updates to its renowned conversational AI chatbot, ChatGPT. One notable addition is the introduction of GPTs, distinct versions of ChatGPT that users, especially those subscribed to ChatGPT Plus, can leverage to perform specific tasks. title: Adrienne Harris leads the largest crypto regulatory unit ‘probably anywhere in the world’
description: Under Adrienne Harris's leadership, the NYDFS has executed a two-year transformative initiative to strengthen its oversight of virtual currencies.
